price: (22) And why should I not worship He who created me and to whom you will be returned?
arabic: وَمَالِيَ لَآ أَعۡبُدُ ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَنِي وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamā liya lā aʿbudu alladhī faṭaranī wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
